description:
Biocat is the organization that champions the healthcare and life sciences ecosystem in Catalonia working to transform science and technology into regional economic growth as well as social impact.  

Biocat focuses its strategy on different key points:

    Raising awareness and promoting the ecosystem, creating tools and strategies for improving the knowledge of the Catalan healthcare sector and increasing its projection both at home and abroad, with the aim of positioning the BioRegion as an international reference.
    Providing innovative training and developing talent, by designing and executing programs and initiatives to improve talent and entrepreneurship considered essential factors for the growth of the sector.
    Accelerating technology transfer and business growth by supporting and carrying out activities for increasing the value of the sector, placing special emphasis on the added value of research, knowledge and technology transfer, internationalization and access to capital.

Set up in 2006 as a public/private foundation, Biocat - along with the government - also drives strategic wide-range policies and projects aimed towards contributing the competiveness of the sector.
name: Biocat
short_description: The cluster organisation for Catalonia's healthcare and life sciences sector.

description:
Trovit is a vertical search engine for classifieds.

If you are looking for an apartment, a job or a new car, Trovit will help you find the ads published in tens of classifieds websites. You can set your own personalized alerts, by email or RSS, for searches and Trovit will alert you when new ads are posted.

description:
In 2002 on the initiative of the employer CECOT Foundation and CP'AC , with the support of the Catalan Institute of Finance creates BANK .

BANK , Business Angels Network Catalonia, is a private institution that connects private investors (business angels) and entrepreneurs seeking funding for the development of their business projects.

BANK , the first Catalan Network of Business Angels, aimed at private investors interested in participating in new projects that can add value to their investments, ie capital, experience, expertise and business contacts.

BANK is part of the Private Investors Network (CHIP) of ACC1Ó is a member of the European Business Angels Network ( EBAN ), the Foundation for Promoting Private Business Angels in Spain las Redes ( ESBAN ) and the Association Spanish Business Angels ( AEBAN ).
name: BANC
short_description: In 2002 on the initiative of the employer CECOT Foundation and CP'AC , with the support of the Catalan Institute of Finance creates BANK .

description:
Miya was established by Shari Arison in 2008 as part of Arison Investments, with the vision of ensuring an abundance of fresh water through efficient management of their cities' existing fresh water resources. 

More than a third of the world's drinking water is lost from urban supply systems, mainly due to undetected underground leaks and mismanagement. The most sustainable and cost-effective way to alleviate such losses is to improve the efficiency of urban water distribution systems by effective water loss management.

description:
Faraday Venture Partners is a private investors club that offers an exclusive investment service to its partners. The company analyzes innovative start-up projects in need of private financing and offers promising projects for investment to partners, co-investors, and business angels.

The company offers project analysis and selection services, to carry out a strictly confidential due diligence process. Active management and assessment of investment stake, to offer diligent acquisition and sales assessment of customers existing investment with the company itself. The company also offers empowerment of entrepreneurial initiatives and custom exit strategy assessment, to maintain a close relationship with portfolio companies, offering personalized support and resources.

Faraday Venture Partners was founded on 2011 and is headquartered in Madrid, Spain.
name: Faraday Venture Partners
short_description: Faraday Venture Partners is a private investors club that actively searches for innovative projects and teams with high potential.

description:
Bake250º partners with startups and creates technology-based scalable businesses. The company offers startups with services related to market analysis, business plan and strategy, product definition and supply, technical development, creating brand identity and promotion, fund search, graphic design, marketing, finance, and operations. It expects 20% to 40% equity from startups for the services it offers them with.

Bake250º generally involves in businesses related to web, mobile, SaaS, software, e-commerce, media, content, and more.

Bravento, The Comunity, CeliCity, Yoleo Club, Roombing, and The Patufet are some of the startups that have worked with Bake250º.

Bake250º is based in Barcelona, Spain.
name: Bake 250
short_description: Bake250º partners with startups and creates technology-based scalable businesses.
